note.p: Education: Private school at Heydon; St John's College, Cambridge (admitted 1710); Inner Temple (admitted 1709); MD
Career: Monumental inscription at Graveley, Hertfordshire.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; Lysons 'Magna Britannia' v5
Notes: Proposed by William Stukeley; Henry Heathcote; Samuel Saunders. Last appeared on PL dated 1729.
